property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: Execution framework set to Hadoop YARN

property.name: mapreduce.map.java.opts
property.description: Large heap-size for child jvms of maps

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.java.opts
property.description: Large heap-size for child jvms of reduces

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
property.description: Higher memory-limit while sorting data for efficiency

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
property.description: More streams merged at once while sort files

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies
property.description: Higher number of parallel copies run by reduces to fetch outputs from large number of maps.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server host:port Default port is 10020

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port Default port is 19888

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir
property.description: Directory where history files are written by MapReduce jobs.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.done-dir
property.description: Directory where history files are managed by the MR JobHistory Server.
